title: Drawing, "Hardware for Bedroom Suite # 9003", September 11, 1935
medium: Graphite and black ink on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite
markings: Stamp in black ink, lower right: DONALD DESKEY/501 MADISON AVENUE/NEW YORK CITY
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite in stamp, lower right: 6394/1"-1'0/F.S./WESTY/D./9/11/35, 9/11/35, 2, SL./1, OFFICE; instructions, dimensions, and materials in graphite
description: Elevations and plans for hardware for suite of bedroom furniture # 9003. Suite includes dresser, chest, desk, 2 night stands, and vanity. Horizontal and rectilinear pulls in walnut with finger pull underneath. Drawing indicates estimate for pulls in walnut or polished chrome.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Hardware for Bedroom Suite # 9003", September 11, 1935.
September 11, 1935. Graphite and black ink on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1975-11-920.
